, pronounced AHH-b-ee-l-EH-s) is a port city in the province of

You can get to Avilés by plane - the airport is near the city and well connected by bus and motorways. The main bus company, Alsa, goes to  the city all the provinces and the most important cities in the country. There are also daily bus services every 30 minutes between Oviedo, Avilés and Gijón.


You can also get there by train. There are two companies, FEVE and RENFE. The first links the city with Gijón, the west of the province, the north coast of Spain and Galicia. The another one, RENFE, goes to Oviedo, the south of the province and the rest of the country.



Fotr more information, visit:

www.renfe.es

www.feve.es

www.alsa.es
